name: Cold Press Juicer, 6.1" Extra Large Feed Chute Fit Whole Fruits & Vegetables, 350W Professional Slow Masticating Juicer Machines, Easy to Clean
about_this_item: „Äê6.1inch Reversible Feed Chute„ÄëYou can directly add whole apples and vegetables to the feed chute, saving your time and increasing juice efficiency.
„Äê50rpm Slow Cold Press Tech„ÄëOur juicer machine rotates at 50rpm, reducing clogging and producing less sediment. It locks in freshness and nutrition, maintaining the natural state of the juice.

„Äê3.1x5.5in Auto-cutting Auger„ÄëThe food-grade spiral auger is more durable and corrosion-resistant. It can extract every drop of deep nutrition from fruits and vegetables, reducing clogging and providing you with health and vitality.
„Äê99% High Juice Yield„ÄëThis 350W masticating juicer machine can efficiently extract juice with a high juice yield of 99%, resulting in less pulp and a smooth taste.

„ÄêEasy to Assemble & Disassemble„ÄëThe cold press juicer has a simple one-piece design with only 3 components, allowing it to be assembled in just 5 seconds. You can simply press a button to remove the body of the juicer and quickly remove stains.
„ÄêAutomatic Safety Sensor„Äë When you open the lid of the feed chute, the juicer machine will automatically stop working, ensuring safety for children and the elderly.
